Class Options.DBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cleo.lexicom.beans.Options.DBConnection

    Options

    public class Options.DBConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Database connection configuration (VLTrader and Harmony only)
